Title: Footloose
Writer: Dean Pitchford (screenplay), Craig Brewer (screenplay), Dean Pitchford (story)
Actors: Kenny Wormald, Julianne Hough, Dennis Quaid, Andie MacDowell
Plot: Being a teenager is tough, and no one knows this better than Ren McCormack, a city kid with a strong feeling for music. Ren's life changes when he moves to a small town where rock-n-roll and dancing are criminal activities. When Ren falls in love with the reverend's daughter, Ariel Moore, the music pauses and Ren needs to shape up or make dancing a legal activity once again.
Production: Dylan Sellers Zadan, Meron Weston Pictures
